Package uk.ac.ebi.utils.io

Class SerializationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.utils.io.SerializationUtils
  • public class SerializationUtils
extends Object
    Object serialisation/unserialisation utils that work with IO streams.
    Author:
    brandizi
    Date:
    26 Aug 2020

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static <T> T deserialize​(File inf)
      Wraps the opening of a buffered FileOutputStream and ObjectOutputStream, then then writes the object in it and closes.
      static <T> T deserialize​(ObjectInputStream in)
      Just like ObjectInputStream.readObject(), with the checked exception wrapper included
      static <T> T deserialize​(String inpath)  
      static void serialize​(File outf, Object object)
      Defaults to false (creates the file from scratch)
      static void serialize​(File outf, Object object, boolean append)
      Wraps the opening of a buffered FileOutputStream and ObjectOutputStream, then then writes the object in it and closes.
      static void serialize​(ObjectOutputStream out, Object object)
      Just like ObjectOutputStream.writeObject(Object), with the checked exception wrapper included
      static void serialize​(String outPath, Object object)  
      static void serialize​(String outPath, Object object, boolean append)
